transactions.description: A transaction was created/initiated, but not yet verified and/or processed.
The transaction maybe verified by customer, but still awaiting or still being processed.
The transaction has been successfully processed and completed.
The customer has failed to verify the transaction within the set time (usually 1 minute), causing the transaction verification to expire.
The transaction has been 'canceled' by customer.
The transaction/payment has failed. It is possible that customer's bank is experiencing a disruption.
The credit-card transaciton has been reversed.
Admin has refunded transaction to the customer via dashboard or the API.
